radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis; stranding around the distal sigmoid colon which is focally thickened; focus of gas adjacent to the sigmoid; concerning for microperforation vs prominent diverticulum; 1.2 x 0.7 cm adjacent low density focus concerning for small/early abscess formation; normal appearance of liver, spleen, gallbladder, pancreas, adrenals, kidneys, small bowel, appendix; normal uterus and unremarkable bladder; multilevel degenerative disease of the thoracic spine.
